Yes, you read that right! In the middle of working on the battle tables, I needed a bit of a break and decided to add a different some stuff that makes it easier for all my helpers: An article editor! It's almost done, and I've used it now to add a new little section: My development notes :D
You'll find them by hovering over "News" and selecting, surprise, "Development Notes".
Hope you'll find something interesting in there! :D

item.title: Development Update
item.description:
Today I have a small update on the current development of wow-petguide.com.
Displaying strategies is certainly the key aspect of the page. Yet all new features of the last year were accessories to that. Cool ones, like the collection viewer, but not hitting the core element that brings battlers to visit Xu-Fu on a daily basis.
That is changing with the next update, because I am working on one of the - in my opinion - coolest features for Xu-Fu so far: a complete revamp of the Battle [...]

item.title: (Un-)Expected downtime
item.description:
Yesterday my web space provider performed a scheduled maintenance on wow-petguide.com. Some might have noticed the downtime of a few hours. It was indeed scheduled, but I messed up the times and thought it's next week.
Sorry for the lack of information about it, but luckily it all went fine and the page is back to normal! :-)

item.title: A new year, a small update... and Discord!
item.description:
Today is the last day of 2017 and oh boy, what a year it has been! So much new content for us pet battlers. We saw the first pet battle dungeons with the Wailing Caverns (https://wow-petguide.com/index.php?m=WailingCritters) and Deadmines (https://wow-petguide.com/index.php?m=Deadmines), dozens of new pets throughout the year, and a whole new set of family challenges with the legendary pets of Argus!
2018 will bring us a new addon and with it surely a brand new set of pet news, and also for [...]

item.title: Happy Holidays!
item.description:
The Feast of Winter Veil is upon us!
Xu-Fu, Aranesh and the whole team wish you all the best for these festive times and hope you have some wonderful and enchanted days.

item.title: Winter Veil Sale of Pets and Mounts
item.description:
If you ever considered one of those shop pets, now might be a good time to revive those thoughts. Blizzard activated a large Winter Veil sale that will last until January 3rd with many pets and also mounts reduced by to 50%!
US Offers (https://us.shop.battle.net/en-gb/family/world-of-warcraft) EU Offers (https://eu.shop.battle.net/en-gb/family/world-of-warcraft)
Enjoy :-)

item.title: 1000 Users! Congratulations to Tovenaar!
item.description:
For a short time only - since November - it is possible to register an account with Xu-Fu. And now, less than two months later, a first milestone is reached: please join me in congratulating for being user number 1000!
It happened much faster than I expected. Actually, I was expecting a lot more problems along the way, but everything seems to work really smoothly :-)
Thanks to everyone for joining and staying with me. It makes me very happy to see this community grow.

item.title: Pet Ready-Checker - everywhere?
item.description:
Sure, why not!
All that work with user accounts and your collection being saved has to lead towards something, doesn't it? The first step of that something just went live!
If you go to any of the main categories you will find that the pet table got a big makeover. It loads a lot faster, checks for required pets with much higher accuracy and gives you more info. And if you are also logged in with your pet collection saved, you will see that the table automatically checks if you have the [...]

item.title: Xu-Fu goes RSS Feed!
item.description:
My last update took a very long time to complete, because most of the features were interlinked with each other. I could not publish any of them without the others being in place. Now that the user system is up and running, I can easily add things on top and also have the time again to work on some smaller, fun things.
For a start, I implemented the suggestion of to add an RSS feed for the news! Since I'm not posting very often, this should give you a convenient way of notification [...]

item.title: Xu-Fu 2.0 is live!
item.description:
It's done !!!
I always wanted to add a user account system but in order to do so I had to learn many new things. It should be easy to use, with enough features in it, but also well encrypted and secured. All of this took a lot of time, but I'm very proud to announce that Xu-Fu accounts are now live!
Check out the Login button on the top right. I recommend creating an account using your Battle.net account. That way you won't need an additional password and will be logged in [...]

item.title: Aranesh is back :-)

item.description:

item.description:

item.title: ¡Hola
item.description:
I am very pleased to announce the release of the fifth language Xu-Fu is localized to: Spanish!
With more than 400 million native speakers in the world - more than English, it is an immensely welcome addition to the page.
I want to express a big thank you to Darlan for taking on this task and making pet guides even more accessible across the globe.

item.description:

Xu-Fu's guide section is up now and follows the same pattern as Wailing Critters. Check out the required pets and guides here! (https://wow-petguide.com/index.php?m=Deadmines)

item.description:

Now they also found their own, separated space in the form of their own category :-) If you are on the Falcosaur quest chain you will ultimetely end up with their individual pet battle quest challenges, and the more than 150 different strategies listed here (https://www.wow-petguide.com/index.php?m=Falcosaur) will hopefully make it a breeze for you!

item.description:
Hi! The Wailing Critters pet battle dungeon is still the biggest pet addition coming in 7.2 I am preparing my personal guide for the challenge mode, but due to the nature of it I am looking for people interested in providing their own guide.

Similar to the Beasts of Fable, you will face legendary pets spread throughout the Tanaan Jungle. Luckily you won't have to chase them down since they will stay in place, like the legendary beasts in Pandaria.

By now Xu-Fu sees about 150 visitors every day from all over the world. Thanks for stopping by and a special thanks to everyone who is leaving a comment or suggesting new features.

item.title: The Darkmoon Faire!
item.description:
The Darkmoon Faire is among us again! This month you can earn even more achievements with the new racer, or should I rather say "flier" ^^
In terms of pet battles nothing has changed, you will still find the two usual dailies available. I posted strategies that you can use to also level pets up and that don't use any exotic or rare pets.
Hope you have a good time!

item.title: Let the guide begin!
item.description:
Welcome to Xu-Fu's Pet Battle Guides!
Today marks the start of this little project.
For a long time I have been doing my daily battles, leveling my pets and trying myself on new challenges. I tried different ways to memorize all the strategies I use. But with more and more fights, nothing felt convenient enough in quickly providing access to the information I needed: what pets, what spells and what rotation to use.
And thus the first version of my own pet guides started, as an online [...]
